subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova and Andy Roddick played very much alike in their wins Wednesday night at the U.S. Open, blistering a combined 31 aces past their flat-footed opponents.
snippet: Maria Sharapova and Andy Roddick played very much alike in their wins Wednesday night at the U.S. Open, blistering a combined 31 aces past their flat-footed opponents.
